name: Transfer Patient
description: Patient transfer notification issued as a result of the patient changing assigned physical location
businessPurpose: Notify receiving applications that a patient has been transferred from one physical location to another within or between healthcare facilities
timing: Sent when patient physical location changes and bed assignment is updated
realWorldScenarios: Room to room transfer within same unit

generationRules.requiredDataQuality: High - accurate location tracking essential for patient safety
